channel.title: Does anyone know how to make a mod? please help
channel.description: i really want to know how to make mods because I have a bunch of great mod ideas but I cant execute them unless someone makes it for me or they just make it because and I want to save everyone some trubble with my pointless posts. so if anyone can find a forum or they just know how to make a mod can you please put the link to the forum(if anyone comes across this forum https://docs.ficsit.app/satisfactory-modding/latest/index.html please do not answer with it I have read it like 90 times not joking and to me it makes no scene) Have a great day and happy modding

item.title: Does anyone know how to make a mod? please help
item.dc:creator: @logan_jordan Logan Jordan
item.description:
@logan_jordan wrote:

ok i will try to do that

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how to make a mod? please help
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

Start with the docs. Please read all of them and skip nothing it is all important https://docs.ficsit.app/satisfactory-modding/latest/Development/BeginnersGuide/index.html and if reading this is to complicated you might want to re-consider doing something else

Read full topic
